Name: ANTILIFE SHELL
Description: Ashimmering barrier extends out from you in a IO-footradius and moves with you, remaining centered onyou and hedging out creatures other than undead andconstrllcts. The barrier lasts for the duration.The barrier prevents an affected creature frompassing or reaching through. An affected creaturecan cast spells or make attacks with ranged or reachweapons through the barrier.Ifyou move so that an affected creatllre is forced topass through the barrier, the spell ends.
